title: Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, 23.6inch Wreath and 8.8 Feet Garland with Pines Cones, Berry Clusters, Frosted Branches, 100 LED Warm Lights for Indoor Outdoor Christmas Decorations
descriptions:
Introducing the Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set - the perfect holiday decoration for your home! This beautiful set includes a wreath with a diameter of 23.6 inches and a garland measuring 8.8 feet long. 

The wreath and garland are adorned with stunning decor elements such as snowflake pine needle branches, two types of pine cones, berry clusters, and frosted branches. To add a warm and cozy touch, the set includes 100 LED warm lights that will beautifully illuminate your space. 

Worried about power sources? Don't be! The LED lights are powered by 3 AA batteries, which are not included in the set. Plus, with the convenient timer function, you can set the lights to stay on for 6 hours and automatically turn off for 18 hours. 

Assembly is a breeze with this set, as it comes pre-lit and fully assembled. You'll also appreciate the sturdy high-quality materials used, which are hypoallergenic and feature fireproof pins for added safety. 

This wreath and garland set is suitable for both indoor and outdoor use, making it versatile for any space. Hang it on your wall, door, fireplace, or place it in your living room, bedroom, dining room, or windows. 

With its strong and durable construction, you can enjoy this set for years to come. It requires minimal maintenance and will never fade, so you won't have to worry about watering or replacing it. 

To give you peace of mind, this product comes with a generous warranty period of 365 days. And if you ever need assistance, our customer service team is available 24 hours a day to help you. 

Don't miss out on this amazing Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set. Bring the festive spirit to your home with ease and style.

Introducing our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, specially designed to make your holiday season merry and bright! This beautifully crafted set includes a wreath with a diameter of 23.6 inches and a garland measuring 8.8 feet in length. 

With its stunning components, including snowflake pine needle branches, two types of pine cones, berry clusters, and frosted branches, this wreath garland set will bring the perfect touch of elegance to your home. 

Featuring 100 LED warm lights, you can enjoy a cozy and festive ambiance. The lights are powered by 3 AA batteries, ensuring hassle-free installation without the need for outlets. Plus, with the convenient timer function, the lights will automatically stay on for 6 hours and then turn off for 18 hours, allowing you to enjoy the beauty of your wreath garland set without worrying about turning it on or off.

Made from sturdy, high-quality materials, this set is built to last. It is also hypoallergenic and features fireproof pins for added safety. Additionally, you can use it both indoors and outdoors, making it versatile for any space in your home. Hang it on your wall, door, fireplace, or even in your living room, bedroom, dining room, or windows to create a festive atmosphere.

You don't need to worry about maintenance either. This wreath garland set requires no water and will never fade, ensuring its beauty lasts throughout the holiday season and beyond. 

To provide you with peace of mind, we offer a 365-day warranty for this product, and our customer service is available 24 hours a day to assist you with any concerns or queries.

Make this holiday season extra special with our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set. Order now and bring the joy of Christmas into your home!
